frame.name: Personal_success
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Person</fen> is in a state of prosperity and/or renown after some period of development or hardship in an <fen>Endeavor</fen>. LUs in this frame invoke a developmental path that is related to the goal one should have in a <fen>Person</fen>, such that the <fen>Person</fen>, after traversing a path of development (including hardship, effort, and time), completes or does not complete these goals. Note that this distinguishes an event's success in this frame from Successful_action.
<ex><fex name="Person">Framenet</fex> is enjoying <fex name="Degree">huge</fex> <t>success</t>.</ex> <ex>He had a long and <t>successful</t> <fex name="Endeavor">career</fex> in banking.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Person
FE.definition:
<def-root>A sentient being or group of beings that is prosperous or well known after being involved in some <fen>Endeavor</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Person">He</fex> became a <t>success</t> at the age of 25.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time when the <fen>Entity</fen> is determined to be successful.
<ex>After 20 years of hard work, he finally <t>made it</t> as an artist <fex name="Time">in '84</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>A qualification of the level of success that the <fen>Entity</fen> achieves.
<ex>He had an <fex name="Degree">extremely</fex> <t>successful</t> career.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Endeavor
FE.definition:
<def-root>An event that the <fen>Person</fen> is involved in which leads to their state of prosperity or renown.
<ex>Looking back, I had a very <t>successful</t> <fex name="Endeavor">career</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition:
<def-root>An explanation of why the <fen>Person</fen> or <fen>Endeavor</fen> achieves its goal of prosperity or renown.
<ex>Apple's iPad is wildly <t>successful</t> <fex name="Explanation">because Apple actually thinks about its customers</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Field
FE.definition:
<def-root>The area in which the <fex name="">Person</fex> achieves success.
<ex>Winfried became <t>successful</t> <fex name="F">in business</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: success [person].n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a person who achieves prosperity or renown after the efforts of an endeavor

lexUnit.name: success [event].n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a long term event in which the partipant or participants achieve prosperity or renown to the degree expected of the event

lexUnit.name: success [state].n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the state of prosperity and renown appropriate to a certain endeavor

lexUnit.name: successful.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: being in a state of prosperity or renown (according to the goals of an endeavor)

lexUnit.name: make it.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: come to achieve prosperity or renown

lexUnit.name: arrive.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: come to achieve prosperity or renown after some period of time

lexUnit.name: succeed.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: achieve the state of prosperity and/or renown.
